description: The mealy beans complement the rich cheese.
name: Mixed Bean & Goat’s Cheese Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g semi-hard goat's cheese, broken up into pieces
2.5 tbs olive oil (save 1/2 tbs for greasing)

recipeInstructions.text: Put the beans in a large bowl and add the chives, vinegar, olive oil, thyme, and chilli flakes and stir to combine. Season well with salt and black pepper.

Stir through the pea shoots, taste, and add a squeeze of lemon if you wish. Transfer to a shallow serving dish and top with the goat’s cheese, a drizzle of olive oil, and a twist of freshly ground black pepper. If you are a meat eater, you might try a little Serrano ham as an accompaniment.
